feed.title: MCEA news and affairs
feed.subtitle: All the latest posts with news and event information for churches and ministries affiliated to MCEA.

entry.title: Home
entry.content:
New Website - John Walton

entry.title: Churches
entry.content:
Participating Churches

The churches in the list below all send representatives to our bi-monthly meetings.

entry.title: About
entry.description: Learn more about John Walton's services.

entry.title: Cheltenham Street Pastors
entry.description: Find out more about Street Pastors and how you can help.
entry.content:
Join The Street Pastors

The Street Pastors will be back out on the streets of Cheltenham. In order to continue the providing the service, we need more volunteers to join our team. If you, or any member of your church would be interested in joining the team, please complete the recruitment information on this link Join Street Pastors or follow the link on the Street Pastors website.

entry.title: Anna Chaplaincy
entry.description: Cheltenham and Bishop's Cleeve Anna Chaplaincy for older people
entry.content:
WHO WE ARE

CaBiC is an interdenominational charity being set up to support and coordinate ministry to older people in Cheltenham and Bishop's Cleeve as part of the national Gift of Years Anna Chaplaincy scheme.

CaBiC is a registered Charitable Incorporated Organisation (1183787)
